jokes.question: Why do most married men die before their wives?
What do diapers and Politicians have in common?
jokes.answer: They both need changing regularly - for exactly the same reason.

jokes.question: What is the definition of the early evening news?
jokes.answer: It starts with the words 'Good evening' then spends the next half an hour tellling you why it isn't one.

jokes.question: What device will find furniture in a poorly lit room every time?
Why do parents give children a middle name?
jokes.answer: So the child knows when it is in seriously in trouble

jokes.question: What is another name for female Viagra?
What did the cowboy say went he went into the car showroom in Germany?
What is the quickest way to speed up your 70 year old husband’s heart rate.
jokes.answer: Tell him that you are pregnant

jokes.question: What is the best way to avoid wrinkles as you age?
What three letters alter boys into men and girls into women?
Why are fish so easy to weigh?
jokes.answer: Because they have their own scales

jokes.question: How you know that you are flying with a 'no frills' airline?
jokes.answer: You need to have the correct change to board the plane.

jokes.question: Why do 'no frills' airlines never show movies on their flights?
jokes.answer: They don’t need to. You keep seeing your life flashing before your very eyes.

jokes.question: On a turkey, which side would you find most feathers?
Why is that all cats dislike flying saucers?
jokes.answer: Because it is impossible for them to reach the milk.

jokes.question: If a cat has nine lives, what has more?
jokes.answer: A frog – it croaks every day.

jokes.question: Which ballet do pigs like best?
What is the big difference between chopped pork and pea soup? Answer : Everybody can chop pork but everyone can't pea soup.
Why is it that we don't eat clowns?
If you saw two cowboys in a kitchen, which would be the real one? Answer : The one stood by the range.
Where would you find a dog with one leg?
jokes.answer: Exactly where you had left it.

jokes.question: Why did the room packed with married people seem empty?
jokes.answer: Because there wasn't a single person there.

jokes.question: What's the difference between a pessimist and a magnet?
What do you call a chicken that is crossing the road?
What is a quicker way to transfer money than electronic banking?
What would you have if you crossed a panther with a beef burger?
What would you have if you crossed a pig with a karate expert?
Why do traffic lights rarely go swimming?
jokes.answer: They take much too long to change.

jokes.question: Why do thieves shower before they commit crime?
jokes.answer: Because they like a clean getaway.

jokes.question: What type of bow can never be tied?
Why did Jack take a prune out for the evening?
Why couldn’t the pirate play poker?
jokes.answer: He was sat on the deck.

jokes.question: Which is the loudest state in the U.S.A.?
Why is it that birds fly southwards for the winter?
jokes.answer: Because it is much too far to walk.

jokes.question: Why is it unpleasant to eat a meal next to a group of basketball players?.
How many teachers would it take to find their way out of a maze?
jokes.answer: No idea as none have ever made it out yet.

jokes.question: Where can you obtain virgin wool?
How can you treble the value any Skoda car?
jokes.answer: Put a gallon of petrol in it.

jokes.question: What is the best definition of a mixed emotion?
jokes.answer: Watching the mother-in-law reverse off a cliff driving your brand new car.

jokes.question: What is a cow with no legs called?
Why does a divorce cost so much?
Where would a 65 year old man find a young, attractive woman who would take any interest in him? Answer : The local bookshop in the section marked 'fiction'.
Why is it a good to use valet parking as you get older?
How would you lift a giraffe with one hand?
jokes.answer: Doesn't matter as you won't find any one handed giraffe?

jokes.question: If a green stone was thrown into the sea what does it become?'
How would a spoilt little rich girl change a light bulb?
jokes.answer: She would ask Daddy to buy her a new apartment

jokes.question: What do people in prison use to communicate with one another?
What would happen if you were to cross two snowmen with three vampires?
What is big, fuzzy and green with four legs and six pockets and if it were to fall from a tree it would probably kill you?
What lettuce was served in the salad bar on the Titanic?
What shakes and twitches and can be found at the sea bottom?
Why is it there so many people with the surname Jones in the telephone book?
Why is it that people always walk whenever they play the bagpipes?
jokes.answer: Even they are attempting to get away from that awful noise.

jokes.question: What happened to the man who lost his left arm, left leg and eye in an accident?
jokes.answer: It was touch and go but he is all right now.

jokes.question: What was the name of the person who made King Arthur’s Round Table?

jokes.answer: They take much too long to change.
